Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  This enhancement gives the power a chance to cause your attacks to gain a +50% chance to land a critical hit for a short time and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This effect will be triggered roughly 3 times per minute.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Scrappers and may be slotted into any Scrapper damage power.
DisplayName: Superior Attuned Superior Critical Strikes F
